  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10420</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Christian Worship - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Los cultos cristianos - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Adhradh Críostaí – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christliche Anbetung - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Culte Chrétien - Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adoração Christian - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Culto Cristiano - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστιανική λατρεία - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A greater understanding of pilgrimage, worship and the liturgical year.</string>
            <string language="es">Una mayor comprensión del peregrinaje, los cultos y el año litúrgico.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tuiscint níos fearr ar oilithreacht, adhradh agus an bhliain liotúirge.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein grösseres Verständnis von Pilgrimage, von 
Anbetung und von liturgical Jahr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plus grand arrangement de pélerinage, de culte
et de l'année liturgique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma compreensão mais grande do pilgrimage, da 
adoração e do ano liturgical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una comprensione più grande del pilgrimage, del 
culto e dell'anno liturgical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια μεγαλύτερη κατανόηση του προσκυνήματος, της 
λατρείας και του λειτουργικού έτους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
